com.continuuity.weave.zookeeper
Interface ZKClientService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, ZKClient
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForwardingZKClientService
public interface ZKClientService
extends ZKClient, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

A ZKClient that extends from Service to provide lifecycle management functions. The Service.start() method needed to be called before calling any other method on this interface. When the client is no longer needed, call Service.stop() to release any resources that it holds.

Nested Class Summary

          Builder for creating an implementation of ZKClientService.
